english: I only eat vegetables on days when I exercise.
pln_types:
(: I (-> (: $i Object) Type))
(: Eat (-> (: $eater Object) (: $eaten Object) Type))
(: Vegetable (-> (: $veg Object) Type))
(: On (-> (: $pred (-> (: $activity Object) Type)) (: $day Object) Type))
(: On (-> (: $pred (-> (: $sub Object) (: $obj Object) Type)) (: $day Object) Type))
(: Day (-> (: $day Object) Type))
(: Exercise (-> (: $exerciser Object) Type))

english: Every boy on Vashon owns a dog that each girl on Vashon calls by a special name.
pln_types:
(: Boy (-> (: $boy Object) Type))
(: Girl (-> (: $girl Object) Type))
(: Dog (-> (: $dog Object) Type))
(: Special (-> (: $name Object) Type))
(: Name (-> (: $name Object) String Type))
(: NameOf (-> (: $named Object) (: $name Object) Type))
(: CallsBy (-> (: $caller Object) (: $called Object) (: $name Object) Type))
(: Calls (-> (: $caller Object) (: $called Object) Type))
(: By (-> (: $pred (-> (: $sub Object) (: $obj Object) Type)) (: $name Object) Type))
(: Owns (-> (: $owner Object) (: $owned Object) Type))
(: On (-> (: $obj1 Object) (: $obj2 Object) Type))
pln_statements:
(: ebvodegvcsn (Implication (And (Boy $b) (And (Name $n "Vashon") (And (NameOf $v $n) (On $b $v)))) (And (Dog $d) (And (Owns $b $d) (Implication (And (Girl $g) (On $g $v)) (And ((& Special Name) $sn $sn_str) (CallsBy $g $d $sn)) (STV 0.95 0.9)))) (STV 0.95 0.9)))

;; Unpack multi-word predicates
(: callsby_means (Implication (CallsBy $x $y $z) (By (Calls $x $y) $z) (STV 0.95 0.9)))
